properties.name: uploadOptions
properties.description: Upload options including the url of post

subProperty.name: acceptedFiles
subProperty.description: Type of upload files, it can be separated by comman if it has multiple types

subProperty.name: addRemoveLinks
subProperty.description: Enable remove button on the thumbnail screen

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Show Icon on the drop panel

properties.name: title
properties.description: Show title on the drop panel

properties.name: preview
properties.description: If this property is true, Show preview images, default value is true
